channel.title: How to check my source base
channel.description:
I'm pretty advanced in building 317 servers , but I didn't understand one thing.
I heared some people here that are talking about Delta source and Devolution source and I didn't understand , THERE ARE LIKE 10957812759362957210 SOURCES IN THE WORLD , HOW DO YOU KNOW IF YOURS IS DELTA OR DEVOLUTION ETC. ?
And what does it matters which source you have? I'm working on StabbingScape source , anyway , how do I know which base the server was built on?
Thanks , Danny ;)

item.title: How to check my source base
item.dc:creator: @Red_Tapuah Red Tapuah
item.description:
@Red_Tapuah wrote:

Kk , thanks everyone!

I kinda retired of 317’s for half a year so I don’t remember alot.

I’m now making a “comback” for 317’s and I will have many questions cuz I forgot 90% of what I knew about 317’s so keep following for more questions :]

Read full topic

item.title: How to check my source base
item.dc:creator: @Red_Tapuah Red Tapuah
item.description:
@Red_Tapuah wrote:

Ok thanks , helped alot.

But I’m trying to add iPanel V2 to my server and there are 2 downloads , delta and devolution , which one should I download?

Read full topic
item.source: How to check my source base

item.title: How to check my source base
item.dc:creator: @Tom_Ownz_U Tom Ownz U
item.description:
@Tom_Ownz_U wrote:

Its hard to tell really. 317’s started off with a small number of bases, then many people edited them so much that they only had small elements of the base server still in them. It doesn’t really matter what source you have either. And the problem with a source like yours, you’ll probably never know what server it was built on unless you can grab the person that made stabbingscape really

Read full topic
item.source: How to check my source base
